description: This file contains a series of unit tests for the frontend React components/pages of the portfolio dashboard project. It specifically tests the functionality of various pages like ProjectsPage, SkillsPage, ProfilePage, ContactPage, and admin pages, utilizing mock API responses and simulating user interactions with fireEvent.

classes.name: ApiError
classes.description: Custom error class used within mocked API client module

methods.name: beforeEach
methods.description: Sets up mocks before each test run

methods.name: test
methods.description: Defines individual test cases for various page functionalities
